properties.name: aomi-tech.autoconfigure.web.log-id.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用日志追踪ID；默认为true

properties.name: aomi-tech.autoconfigure.web.app.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Web应用自动配置；默认为true

properties.name: aomi-tech.autoconfigure.web.error.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Web错误自动JSON渲染;默认为true

properties.name: aomi-tech.autoconfigure.web.exception.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Web异常JSON渲染;默认为true
